attributes.action: random compulsory drug/alchol  testing for all mps
attributes.additional_details: All mps to agree to random compulsory drugs and alcohol tests. As the decision makers for our country we the people have a right to know that all decisions are made with a clear head. We expect many of our other public servants to be randomly tested for the jobs they do and quite rightly so. As mps have been voted in by the people of this country we want to know they perform there duty correctly and therefore ask for transparency.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House to consider not for Government
